com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo

Class AbstractSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo.AbstractSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSet, Script

    public abstract class AbstractSource
extends Object
implements Source
    Abstract base class for objects that describe the source files that will be loaded into the in-memory database.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
